homepage.heroSubtitle: Discover amazing recipes, share your culinary creations, and stay updated with our delicious newsletters. Join a community of passionate home cooks and professional chefs.
homepage.featuresSubtitle: Everything you need to elevate your cooking journey
homepage.recipeCollectionDesc: Thousands of recipes from home cooks and professional chefs, all with detailed ingredients and step-by-step instructions.
homepage.culinaryNewslettersDesc: Stay updated with the latest food trends, cooking tips, and seasonal recipes delivered right to your inbox.
homepage.communityDrivenDesc: Join a vibrant community where everyone can share their favorite recipes and culinary discoveries.
homepage.featuredRecipesSubtitle: Discover amazing dishes that our community loves
homepage.recentNewslettersSubtitle: Stay informed with the latest culinary insights and trends

newsletters.title: Newsletter Articles
newsletters.subtitle: Discover inspiring cooking stories, tips, and insights from our community
newsletters.noArticlesDescription: Try adjusting your search or filters, or create the first article!
newsletters.demoNotice: Real Articles from Our Community! These are actual articles shared by users like you. Even though some are marked as demos, they are completely real and informative content.
newsletters.authorBio: is a passionate food writer and recipe developer who believes in the power of good food to bring people together. With years of experience in professional kitchens and food journalism, they share insights that make cooking accessible and enjoyable for everyone.
newsletters.getLatestRecipes: Get the latest recipes and cooking tips delivered to your inbox.

recipes.title: Recipe Collection
recipes.subtitle: Discover delicious recipes from our community of passionate cooks
recipes.noRecipesDescription: Try adjusting your search or filters, or create the first recipe!

content.joinCommunity: Join thousands of food enthusiasts who share and discover amazing recipes every day.
content.editorialTransparencyText: This recipe was originally published on {createdDate} and last modified on {updatedDate}. All modifications are tracked to maintain culinary integrity and proper attribution.

recipes.discoverRecipes: Discover amazing recipes shared by our community of passionate cooks and chefs
recipes.createYourTakeDescription: Want to modify this recipe with your own twist? Create your own version while giving credit to the original creator.
recipes.demoRecipeDescription: This is a demo recipe showcasing our platform features. However, it's a **real, tested recipe** with accurate ingredients and instructions that you can follow to create this dish!
recipes.realRecipesBanner: Real Recipes from Our Community! These are actual recipes shared by users like you. Even though some are marked as demos, they are completely real and followable recipes.

account.allSettingsOff: All settings off by default for privacy
account.allowPhotosLocation: Allow photos to include where they were taken
account.keepCameraSettings: Keep camera settings for photography enthusiasts
account.keepOriginalDateTime: Keep original date and time information
account.includeDeviceInfo: Include which device took the photo
account.photoSettingsDescription: These settings let you choose what information to keep in your photos. By default, all settings are off for maximum privacy, but you can enable them to preserve camera settings, location context, and more. Your choices are saved and will apply to all future photo uploads.
account.tryAdjustingSearch: Try adjusting your search or filters, or

create.chooseContribution: Whether you have an amazing recipe to share or culinary insights to publish, choose how you'd like to contribute to our community.
create.addFavoriteRecipe: Add your favorite recipe with ingredients, instructions, and cooking tips.
create.uploadPhotos: Upload photos of your dish and ingredients
create.setDifficulty: Set difficulty level and cooking time
create.shareCulinaryInsights: Share culinary insights, cooking tips, and food trends with the community.
create.richTextEditor: Rich text editor with formatting options
create.descriptionPlaceholder: Describe your recipe, its origins, and what makes it special...
create.originalCreatorPlaceholder: e.g., Julia Child, Traditional Italian cuisine
